summary: Adds a new perk under Power Bash for Ordinator Perks of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
(Sent a message to T3ndo, hes been away for a week and i dont think he will be back anytime soon according to his goodbye post but if he those and want this mod gone then ill remove it)

Adds a new perk under Power Bash for Ordinator Perks of Skyrim ( https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68425/? ) and made compatible with other such patches that dont edit the Power bash perk

The Perk added is Shove from Perkus Maximus and for those that dont remember it, its a shield bash that was very nicely done by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3958792/]T3nd0
[/url]
author: Rhonen5
